Name: In the thrall of darkness: The gift of dreams
About the game: In the thrall of darkness is a horror game in which you must get out of this nightmare. You should do everything that you are not caught monsters: hide in closets, under beds and don't let the monsters kill you. Solve puzzles in your dreams, it will help you to understand what happened to our hero. Your primary task is the search for answers. It's a reality or just a dream? This is not the last version of the game The game will be updated, prolonging the story and correcting the mistakes and bugs
